It's the best for lot's of years in the lower east side!!
Very knowledgeable and experienced!!!
Thanks again, I had my dog groomed today and like always, extremely satisfied with her knowledge and years of grooming!!
Thanks for making my child look so gorgeous!!!
Before and after pictures, I didn't recognize my own child lol, amazing

originalText.text: We've been coming here for years - Evelyn is the best! She is extremely consistent and my dog always looks amazing ðŸ’¯

text.text: We've been coming here for years - Evelyn is the best! She is extremely consistent and my dog always looks amazing ðŸ’¯

originalText.text:
We've been here several times and our dog always looks so cute once finished! This is the 3rd groomer we've been to in NYC and they are by far the fastest. Our poor dog was at a groomer for 8 hours once (she's only a 25lb cocker spaniel) and it was important for us to find a place that focused their attention on one dog at a time, which is what they do at Doggie Dearest and I love that! Our dog was in and out in less than 2 hours. The owner has always been super friendly as well.

The only reason we didn't come sooner is because the phone number listed online rings without answer. I would recommend texting to schedule an appt as she's very responsive via text!

originalText.text: I have a one year old Toy goldendoodle and this is the only place she has ever been groomed. I was referred to her by a friend who couldnâ€™t say enough about how much she loved it. My puppy is like my child so I wouldnâ€™t leave her anywhere unless I was certain she would be well looked after. Each time we return she is happy to see Evelyn. She stays approx 2 hours which I love because most groomers make the dogs stay all day. When I pick her up she looks gorgeous. She is groomed exactly how I asked. Everlyn is kind and also pleasant. She confirms appts and makes everything so easy. Itâ€™s clear she is an animal lover. I canâ€™t recommend her enough.

originalText.text: So glad i found Doggie Dearest! Our dog Finn doesnâ€™t need complicated grooming, but he does need more trimming than i can do at home. Evelyn and her team are caring and skilled, and she takes the time to discuss services clearly â€” Finn leaves her shop happy and looking great! The price is very reasonable, and Evelyn has super helpful tips about dog care and behavior. Highly recommended.
